summary: This document contains the consent resolutions of the Board of Directors of Southern Trust Company, Inc. and Financial Infomatics, Inc., detailing corporate actions including the transfer of shares and a merger. It highlights Jeffrey Epstein's role as a key shareholder and director in both corporations, as well as the approval of various corporate governance actions.
